page.title: 07Sheltered Housing Wootton
page.content: We visited a lady aged 87 living on the old people's estate. These are bungalows, small but compact, well decorated and cheerful looking. They contain four rooms:-lounge, bedroom, kitchen and bathroom. In the hall there is an {intercom} system for calling the Warden and in every room there is an emergency bell-pull. The bungalows are built as semi-detached pairs linked by open plan lawns at the front but divided into small gardens at the rear. A neighbour cares for our lady's garden now that she is incapable of doing it herself. None of the bungalows has a garage; there are blocks of garages at either end of the crescent. Recently young boys have been gathering there with their motorbikes causing a nuisance by revving the engines and tearing round the block.
